entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 8 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 6 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:18 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 07:18 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
